= Usage =
{{{
usage :exediff [-h?tdq][-n#] (FILE1 FILE2 | DIR1 DIR2 [WILD] | DIR1 DIR2Â¥WILD)
  $Revision: 1.11 $
  -h -?   this help
  -t      ignore time stamp
  -d      dump file image
  -q      quiet mode
  -n#     max length of differ rawdatas. default is 4
  FILE1/2 compare exe/dll file
  DIR1/2  compare folder
  WILD    compare files pattern in DIR2. default is *
}}}
